description: Type the phrase shown to make your Beanstalk sprout.
Get 4 phrases in a row right, and the plant will grow a new segment.
If you get one wrong, no sweat, you’ll just have to start again from your current segment.
Every word you type improves the accuracy of digitized texts of the Biodiversity Heritage Library.
Correctly typed words are sent to libraries to save books from digital oblivion!
Your plant grows the more you contribute.  Compare your efforts to others’ efforts on the high score list.
Punctuation in phrases matters, so type carefully.
Capitalization doesn’t matter.  You can type words with capitals as all lowercase.
Some phrases have multiple words.  Use spaces to separate these words.
Do the best you can with a standard keyboard.  For example, type é as e, and æ as ae.
Use the slash character, ‘/’, for fractions.
Some phrases will be impossible to type.  If you run into one of these press “pass” to skip it.
Stay on the lookout for special characters! You'll see a new one for every stalk you grow during the game.
Comments or suggestions about Beanstalk? We would love to hear them! Please leave us feedback here.
